definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Min'an Jie No. 16, Dongzhimen, Across from the Russian embassy.
sentences.chinese: 民安街16号，东直门，俄罗斯大使馆对面。

sentences.english: I want to move from Xizhimen to Dongzhimen.
sentences.chinese: 我要从西直门搬到东直门。

sentences.english: It's over by Dong Zhimen subway.
sentences.chinese: 它在东直门地铁站附近。

sentences.english: Cust : I am in the Dongzhimen now, how can I get to the nearest Chian Citic bank?
sentences.chinese: 我现在在东直门，我怎样才能到去最近的中信银行呢？

sentences.english: Csr: The nearest sub-branch in Dongzhimen should be the Fuhua Sub-branch.
sentences.chinese: 东直门最近的分行是富华分行。

sentences.english: I just passed through Dongzhimen and saw the new airport express platform.
sentences.chinese: 我刚才路过东直门，看到机场快轨的站台了。

definition: Xizhimen neighborhood of Beijing/the main northwest gate of Beijing
Guanganmen in Xuanwu 宣武區|宣武区 district of southwest Beijing
Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005
Shunyi district of Beijing, formerly Shunyi county
